titles.title: A resolution to inform the President of the United States of the election of Speaker and Clerk of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Informs the President that the House of Representatives has elected the Honorable Jim Wright, of Texas, as Speaker, and Donnald K. Anderson as Clerk for the 100th Congress.
